response.overview: Hockey: The Lighter Side is an amusing and entertaining look at the game of hockey as it's never been seen before. It's a combination of bone-crunching checks, silly slips and falls, and strange circumstances on the ice. Hockey: The Lighter Side also lets you in on player's pranks and gags as well as many other surprises that are certain to please. Featured in the videotape is former Rangers' goaltender John Davidson along with special appearances by current stars like Glenn Anderson, Larry Robinson, and Cam Neely.
response.tagline: Exciting, funny, spills & thrills, and crunching checks.
response.title: Hockey: The Lighter Side
